bio: Chummer loves eating kids. He'll make them loiter after school before devouring them. He likes asparagus too.

soultimate.name: Sharkskin Shield
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: 7.5% HP restored every 2 seconds when below 50%.
